item.title: The Grain Pits Are Flooding
item.description: Heavy rain causes flooding in the grain pits, creating challenges on the farm as the crew works quickly to manage the water and protect the harvest.

media:content.media:title: The Grain Pits Are Flooding
media:content.media:description: Heavy rain causes flooding in the grain pits, creating challenges on the farm as the crew works quickly to manage the water and protect the harvest.

item.title: New Project: Clearing Grandma’s Lawn
item.description: The Larson Farms crew kicks off a fresh project by clearing out Grandma’s lawn, showing the first steps of turning an overgrown yard into usable space.

item.title: We Got The World's Biggest Grain Cart Stuck!
item.description: It was a huge problem. We'll show you what it was like to get our biggest grain cart stuck and the difficult process of getting it out of the field.

item.title: Testing the Crop Chaser 1000
item.description: The Larson Farms crew puts the Crop Chaser 1000 to work in the field, showing how this machine boosts efficiency and makes harvest smoother.

item.title: S790 Combine Gets a Track Makeover
item.description: What does it take to give a combine's tracks a makeover? This video is a guide to the challenging process of replacing the tracks on a S790 combine for a smoother, more efficient ride.

item.title: Finishing What He Started! Taking Down The Barn!
item.description: The time had come to finish the job. This video shows a look at the powerful equipment we used to take down an old barn and make way for a new project.

item.title: She’s Finally Here! Setting Up the New Grain Cart for Harvest!
item.description: The wait is over! We are so excited to have our new grain cart arrive just in time for harvest season. Watch as we get it all set up for its first big job in the field.

item.title: When It Blew Up…It Destroyed Everything!!
item.description: When It Blew Up…It Destroyed Everything!!

item.title: Was This A Good Idea??
item.description: Some ideas seem good at the time, but the outcome is always a surprise. This video documents our story of a questionable plan that had a unique result.

item.title: We Sold Our Best Tractor?!
item.description: It was a difficult decision, but we had to do it. This is the story of how we parted ways with our best tractor

item.title: We Can’t Catch A Break!! Stuck In The Dry Field!
item.description: Everything was going fine until our equipment gave out. Here’s a first-hand account of a frustrating situation and the challenge of getting unstuck.

item.title: Outrunning The Storm!
item.description: Can we outrun the storm? We're in a race against the clock to finish a job before the bad weather hits. This is the story of our biggest weather challenge yet.

item.title: The Grain Pits Are Flooding!!
item.description: The Grain Pits Are Flooding!!

item.title: Had To Call In Back Up!
item.description: When a job is too big to handle alone, you have to call for help. I'll tell you the story of a tough situation that required some backup to get the job done.

item.title: He Quit On His First Day Back!!
item.description: After returning to the job, he resigned on his very first day back. This is the story of a surprising career move and the reasons that led to the unexpected decision.

item.title: Had To Call In Back Up!
item.description: When a job is too big to handle alone, you have to call for help. I'll tell you the story of a tough situation that required some backup to get the job done.

item.title: New Salford Shows Up On Yard
item.description: The wait is over! Join us for a full tour of the newest addition to our fleet: a brand new Salford. We'll give you a first look and get it ready for its first big job.

item.title: We Can Get Anything Stuck!!!!
item.description: It seems like no matter what we drive, we can get it stuck. Watch as we get a piece of equipment stuck and what it took to get it out.

item.title: 4 Seasons And This Thing Is Shot! Very Disappointing!
item.description: A piece of equipment was supposed to last for years, but instead, it failed after only four seasons. We'll show you the issues and the difficult journey of repair.

item.title: Equipment Just Don’t Last! Rain Delay Repairs!
item.description: Equipment Just Don’t Last! Rain Delay Repairs!
